channel.title: 100 errors rep++ :'[
channel.description:

item.title: 100 errors rep++ :'[
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Brutal I am Brutal
item.description:
@I_am_Brutal wrote:

I’ll help you, but not via teamviewer.
What file did you edit before you started receiving the “100 errors” error?
Oh yeah I see what you did. Easy easy easy fix.
You recently edited someones character sheet and missed a bracket making a trickle down effect of errors.

Read full topic

You should try to program in a clear editor like notepad++.

Oh and you need 15+ rep to rep+.
